component.name: FeaturedStationsPanel
component.script:
sub init() m.top.observeField("focusedChild", "focusChanged")
m.content = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode")
m.rowlist = m.top.findNode("StationsRowList") m.rowlist.content = m.content m.rowlist.observefield("rowItemSelected", "rowItemSelected")
m.top.SetFocus(true)
setupStations() end sub
function focusChanged() if m.top.isInFocusChain() m.rowlist.setFocus(true) end if end function
function onKeyEvent(key as String, press as Boolean) as Boolean handled = false
if key = "back" if m.childScreen <> invalid print "FeaturedStations#onKeyEvent" m.top.removeChild(m.childScreen) m.childScreen = invalid m.rowlist.setFocus(true) handled = true end if end if
return handled end function
